short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to easily save your tabs so that you dont have as many open at a time

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allows you to save all of your currently open tabs into a group, so that you can easily re-open them later when you want to continue with them.

This addon also allows you to transfer your tabs between devices signed in on the same chrome account.
